p: MDM Kadiyala: Conceptualization, crop model simulation, original draft preparation, Nedumaran S: Economic analysis with IMPACT model, Jyosthnaa: Economic data analysis, visualization and data curation, Murali Gumma: Remote sensing & GIS analysis, crop type mapping, Sridhar Gummadi: crop model analysis using cluster computing facility, Srigiri: Adaptation options finalization, stakeholder engagement, Ricky Roberson: Software, Anthony Whitbread: Reviewing and editing and overall supervision
